segments.text: In this kitchen drawing, everything seems routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman is methodically drying a plate by the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is on, water filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's starting to overflow gently onto the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands with one foot in the water, expression unchanged.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, upper cabinets are ajar with the cookie jar visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy perches on a step stool, extending toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand inside grabbing treats, the other balancing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool appears unsteady, legs not quite level.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby reaches up, open palm expectant for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink frames a neat garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back allow daylight to illuminate the space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter beside the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a typical domestic moment with subtle disruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the hidden elements of risk here.
segments.speaker: PAR
